availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, county clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Julia Carson. Married to Sophia Carson on August 14, 1862. Father of Mary Carson, Sarah Carson, Cynthia Carson, Charles Carson, Margaret Carson, Martha Carson, Pattie Carson, Mollie Carson, Willie Carson, and Thomas Carson. Merchant in Lincoln County in 1850. Clerk of the County in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District no. 2, p. 301.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 121.
Kentucky County Marriages 1783-1965, Lincoln County, 1851-1902, p. 67.
Find A Grave, "Ransom Carson (1816-1886)," Memorial #87739004, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87739004 (accessed November 28, 2018).
